section.title: Website
section.para: This website is built using Docusaurus 2, a modern static website generator.

To build and test documentation locally, begin by downloading and installing Node.js, and then installing Yarn. On Windows, you can install via the npm package manager (npm) which comes bundled with Node.js:

literallayout.computeroutput: pip install pydoc-markdown cd website yarn install

section.para: Navigate to the website folder and run:
This command starts a local development server and opens up a browser window. Most changes are reflected live without having to restart the server.
